subject: True Evil? To hunt or not to hunt?
author: Chad
full_text:
I am scheduled to do an investigation on Saturday. Let me say, I have
very little experience with investigating, and have really only
started very recently. I am going with an experienced group to
investigate a residence described as very active. Lots of class A
EVPs, supposed incubus/succubus activities, described as an
infestation. What are your thoughts on known demonic entity
investigations?
